PATIENT_ID: TEST_ERT_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-05 02:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-05 02:05:00
Category I activation for 27-year-old male. Pulseless on arrival.
Penetrating thoracic GSW. Single entry wound left anterior chest.
Pulseless trauma patient with penetrating chest mechanism.
Witnessed arrest in field. Down time approximately 8 minutes.
Signs of life present: organized cardiac electrical activity on monitor.
Pupillary response present. Reactive pupils bilaterally.
BP unattainable. HR undetectable by palpation.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-02-05 02:08:00
CPR in progress. Massive transfusion protocol activated.
Signs of life documented on arrival: organized cardiac activity.
Arrest timing: witnessed arrest with transport time under 15 minutes.

[OPERATIVE_NOTE] 2026-02-05 02:12:00
Emergency resuscitative thoracotomy performed in trauma bay.
ED thoracotomy via left anterolateral approach.
Cardiac tamponade evacuated. Cardiorrhaphy performed.
ROSC achieved after thoracotomy and cross-clamping.
